name: Artemis
description: Artemis, mistress of beasts and sovereign of the wild, rules hunting, wildlife, the moon and the protection of maidens.

skills.name: Gale-Force Shot
skills.description: Artemis leaps to the very back of the battlefield and moves along the edge while firing 1 shot every 0.7s, dealing PEN DMG equal to 180% of ATK. The skill lasts 8s, and Artemis gains Super Armor for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per shot to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per shot to 220% of ATK.

skills.name: Steadied Shot
skills.description: Fires a net at the nearest enemy, ensnaring them in place for 2s and dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Ensnared enemies have their Dodge Rate reduced by 50% for 8s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Hunter’s Snare
skills.description: When a nearby target attacks Artemis, she gains an additional 50% Dodge Rate for 3s.

upgrades.level3: Increases the Dodge Rate duration to 5s.

skills.name: Cloud-Piercer
skills.description: Artemis fires piercing arrows at the most vulnerable enemy, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK to each enemy hit.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Piercing arrows also deal bonus DMG equal to 15% of the target’s current HP.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 250% of ATK.

relic.name: Hail of Arrows
relic.description: Cloud-Piercer can be cast during Gale-Force Shot.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the cooldown of Cloud-Piercer by 50% during Gale-Force Shot.
upgrades.level3: Steadied Shot can be cast during Gale-Force Shot.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the cooldown of Steadied Shot by 50% during Gale-Force Shot.
